alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:40AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL AITKIN AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 915 AM CDT... At 840 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palisade, or near Big Sandy Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Sandy Lake, McGregor, Palisade, Tamarack, Libby, Wright, Balsam, Flowage Lake, Sheshebee, Gun Lake, and Savanna Portage State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
